title: [DOWNTIME] 28/04/16 OCE SERVER DOWNTIME
body:
The OCE server is currently down as of 28/04/16 7:15pm AEST, I will post updates here.

UPDATE: 28/04 @ 7:17pm AEST

> The issue is currently being investigated and should be resolved soon.

UPDATE: 28/04 @ 7:20pm AEST

> Loss prevented has been enabled.

UPDATE: 28/04 @ 7:38pm AEST

> You should be able to login to the client again (The problem is not 100% resolved so rank queues will remain disabled)

UPDATE: 28/04 @7:50pm AEST

> The issue should be resolved now.

replies.body: i was in the cham sele and this is my prom dude, is this count to lost or shi,t ?
unfortunately i think it might count as a loss. sorry friend.
They're doing something with ranked queues. Will that keep the server down for long or not?
what happen if you were in a middle of a game?
lol i just finished one and won hope i dont get half lp to loss prevented
